resources.string: An error occurred. We are actively working on resolving it. Please try again later.

Assignment for driver with id %1$s is not found. Please try another driver.
Drivers list. What\'s supported:\n-clicking on a driver shows driver\'s shipment assignment\n-refreshing a list returns random number of drivers
Oops. Something is terribly wrong happened. We are actively working on resolving the issue. Sorry for the inconvenience.
